title: Combat Wings: Battle of Britain
notes: combat wings-battle of britain critical error: font not found in system fonts (arial.ttf)

Game runs fine after using winetricks to install the corefonts that it requires
https://github.com/Sirmentio/protontricks - this tool will help to install - just get the gameid folder then do a
protontricks 34820 corefonts - on a terminal on your linux host
Intro screen doesnt show but music comes out then main menu appears
title: Combat Wings: Battle of Britain

notes: As other user explained, install wine+winetricks and then install corefonts using tool from github. It take some time to finish installation in terminal. Game will run with black screen and music. After intro is completed, main menu will pop up and game runs just fine. XBOX 360 wireless controller is recognized, but maneuvering is awkward as aiming reticule is jumping around too fast. Playing with mouse is a way to go.
title: Combat Wings: Battle of Britain
